resources.string: Oops, a page you\'re looking for was not found! :(

Join us in congratulating the latest apps and games entering the Android Excellence program on Google Play. This diverse group of apps and games is recognized for their high quality, great user experience, and strong technical performance. Whether you\'re interested in learning meditation or a new language, or are looking for a game about butterflies or warships, we\'re excited to dive in to these new collections.

Information on movies and TV shows is available at PopCorn, such as the year of release, movie time, general movie summary, related movies, cast, etc. The films and tv shows are divided into three categories: \"Popular\", \"Top rated\" and \"Now playing/Today\'s Show\".
The entire database used in this documentation is provided by The Movie Database API (TMDb). For more information: \nhttps://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api
Developed by Valmir Torres de Jesus Junior
This project is available on github: \nhttps://github.com/valmirt/kotlin-mvp-dagger2
To contact, please send an email to valmirt.dev@gmail.com
, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!

Thanks for downloading the PopCorn app. This application aims to provide information about movies and TV shows, such as the year of release, movie time, general summary about the film, related films, cast, etc.

There is no option to watch any movie or TV shows in this application.

Any available means of consuming movies and TV shows without the proper acquisition is piracy and piracy is a crime.

Enjoy PopCorn and, once again, thank you very much for the download.
